Title: Relates to sentencing for the crime of aggravated cruelty to animals
Summary: Relates to sentencing for the crime of aggravated cruelty to animals; removes the two year imprisonment cap.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to sentencing for the crime of aggravated cruelty to animals
